title: No roads? There's a drone for that
description: A billion people in the world lack access to all-season roads. Could the structure of the internet provide a model for how to reach them? Andreas Raptopoulos of Matternet thinks so. He introduces a new type of transportation system that uses electric autonomous flying machines to deliver medicine, food, goods and supplies wherever they are needed.
author: Andreas Raptopoulos
keywords: TED, talks, drones, technology, transportation, infrastructure
